item.title: CoreWeave 将投资 60 亿美元建设宾夕法尼亚州人工智能数据中心
item.description: 为 OpenAI 公司和微软公司等公司提供人工智能计算能力的 CoreWeave 公司表示，随着该公司在全美范围内扩大产能，它计划投资多达 60 亿美元在宾夕法尼亚州兰开斯特建立一个数据中心。【原文：CoreWeave Inc., a provider of AI computing power to companies including OpenAI Inc. and Microsoft Corp., said it plans to invest as much as $6 billion to set up a data center in Lancaster, Pennsylvania, as the firm expands its capacity across the US.】

item.title: 中国买家今年在美国购房的花费增加了 83
item.description: 按美元价值和购买数量计算，中国买家仍是美国住宅房地产最大的外国投资者群体。【原文：Chinese buyers remained the largest group of foreign investors in US residential real estate by both dollar value and number of purchases.】

item.title: 德国投资者信心回升，贸易复苏迹象明显
item.description: 投资者对德国经济的信心在 7 月份有所增强，这凸显了德国政府在柏林加大支出的同时，面对美国关税威胁所表现出的韧性。【原文：Investor confidence in Germany’s economy improved in July, highlighting resilience in the face of US tariff threats as the government in Berlin ramps up spending.】

item.title: 韩国将与离岸银行成立外汇改革小组
item.description: 韩国将成立一个小组，与离岸银行定期讨论改善外汇市场的问题，这是为解决韩国加入主要发达市场股票指数的关键障碍而采取的又一措施。【原文：South Korea will form a panel for regular discussions with offshore banks to improve its foreign exchange market, another step to address key hurdles in its bid to join a major developed-market stock index.】

item.title: 印度央行行长称利率走势取决于增长与通胀的关系
item.description: 印度央行行长桑杰-马尔霍特拉（Sanjay Malhotra）周二表示，如果亚洲第三大经济体的通胀率低于预期或增长面临压力，印度央行将考虑进一步降息。【原文：India’s central bank will consider cutting interest rates further if inflation falls below its projection or growth comes under pressure in Asia’s third largest economy, Governor Sanjay Malhotra said on Tuesday.】

item.title: Nextdoor 重新启动网络，重点关注新闻、警报和人工智能
item.description: Nextdoor Holdings Inc.是一家专注于邻里关系的社交网络，该公司推出了一系列新功能，作为全面重新设计的一部分，旨在突出更多紧急内容并提高用户参与度。【原文：Nextdoor Holdings Inc., the neighborhood-focused social network, unveiled a slew of new features as part of a sweeping redesign that aims to highlight more urgent content and boost user engagement.】

item.title: 印度 6 月贸易赤字因进出口下滑而缩小
item.description: 由于华盛顿关税政策对全球供应链造成的持续压力，出口和进口均出现下降，印度 6 月份的贸易赤字低于预期。【原文：India posted a smaller-than-expected trade deficit in June, as both exports and imports declined amid ongoing strain on global supply chains from Washington’s tariff policies.】

item.title: 银行为斯通彼克公司的 IFCO 交易准备了 24 亿欧元的一揽子债务方案
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，美国银行（Bank of America Corp）是预计将安排 24 亿欧元（28 亿美元）债务融资以支持 Stonepeak Partners 收购 IFCO 集团 50% 股份的银行之一。【原文：Bank of America Corp. counts among a list of banks expected to arrange €2.4 billion ($2.8 billion) in debt financing to support Stonepeak Partners’ acquisition of a 50% stake in IFCO Group, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 投资者寻求安全，中国债券ETF吸引大量资金流入
item.description: 中国最大的一些追踪长期债券的交易所交易基金出现了数月来最大的资金流入，反映出即使在经济出现复苏迹象的情况下，投资者对更安全资产的需求仍在增长。【原文：Some of China’s largest exchange-traded funds tracking long-term bonds have seen their biggest inflows in months, reflecting growing investor demand for safer assets even as signs of economic resilience emerge.】

item.title: 埃及推迟部分液化天然气进口，原因是新终端尚未启动
item.description: 埃及正在推迟一些液化天然气的交付，因为其最新的进口设施尚未开始运行。【原文：Egypt is delaying some liquefied natural gas deliveries as its newest import facilities haven’t yet started operating.】

item.title: 美银美林民调显示投资者涌入风险资产的速度创历史新高
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的月度调查显示，由于对经济增长和企业利润强劲持乐观态度，基金经理们正以创纪录的速度重新投入风险资产。【原文：Fund managers are rushing back into risky assets at a record pace on optimism over economic growth and strong corporate profits, according to a monthly survey by Bank of America Corp.】

item.title: 英迪拉试管婴儿公司据称将重启印度首次公开募股，或将募集 4.08 亿美元资金
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，英迪拉试管婴儿医院正在重启其在印度的首次公开募股计划，并将很快提交上市的初步文件，可能会获得 350 亿卢比（约合 4.08 亿美元）的收益。【原文：Indira IVF Hospital is reviving its initial public offering plans in India and will soon submit preliminary documents for a listing that may fetch 35 billion rupees ($408 million), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 世界银行支持耗资 4 亿美元的莫桑比克输电计划
item.description: 世界银行集团成员国际金融公司同意为一条输电线路提供发展资金，以加强莫桑比克的电网。【原文：The International Finance Corp., a member of the World Bank Group, agreed to provide development funding for a transmission line to strengthen Mozambique’s grid.】

item.title: 据说 SMFG 将向 Yes 银行追加 11 亿美元投资
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，三井住友金融集团正在考虑向印度贷款机构 Yes Bank Ltd. 追加 11 亿美元的投资，这是继日本第二大银行两个月前追加投资之后的又一笔投资。【原文：Sumitomo Mitsui Financial Group Inc. is considering making an additional $1.1 billion investment in Indian lender Yes Bank Ltd., people familiar with the matter said, following a previous investment made by Japan’s second-biggest bank two months ago.】

item.title: 美国可能举行贸易谈判，欧洲股市上涨；科技股上涨
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示愿意与欧盟进行更多贸易谈判，以及英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：European stocks ticked up on Tuesday after US President Donald Trump indicated he is open to more trade negotiations with the European Union and Nvidia Corp. said it planned to resume sales of its H20 AI chip to China after securing Washington’s backing.】

item.title: 欧洲复兴开发银行称，特朗普关税打击了欧盟东部的全球化赢家
item.description: 欧洲复兴开发银行（European Bank for Reconstruction and Development）首席经济学家贝亚塔-亚沃尔契克（Beata Javorcik）认为，几十年来一直从全球化中获益的东欧经济体的前景正随着美国提高关税而恶化。【原文：The outlook for eastern European economies, which for decades have reaped the benefits of globalization, is deteriorating as the US hikes tariffs, according to Beata Javorcik, chief economist at the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development.】

item.title: 美元下滑危及欧洲大市值公司的收益
item.description: 美元走软的不利影响即将在欧洲财报中显现，这使得货币走势成为本报告季的一个关键话题。【原文：The unwelcome effects of a weaker dollar are about to show up in European earnings, making currency moves a key topic this reporting season.】

item.title: 交易商评估特朗普对俄罗斯的威胁，欧洲天然气走低
item.description: 交易商消化了美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的威胁，即如果不能就乌克兰和平问题达成协议，将对俄罗斯实施经济处罚，欧洲天然气走低。【原文：European natural gas edged lower as traders digested US President Donald Trump’s threat to hit Russia with financial penalties if there’s no deal on peace in Ukraine.】

item.title: 英国将重新发放 3750 英镑补助金支持购买部分电动汽车
item.description: 英国工党政府正在重新推出高达 3,750 英镑（5,000 美元）的补助金，以支持电动汽车的购买，以支持其陷入困境的汽车行业，并实现净零排放目标。【原文：The UK is reintroducing grants of as much as £3,750 ($5,000) to support electric vehicle purchases, as the Labour government seeks to bolster its beleaguered auto industry and meet net zero goals.】

item.title: 英国央行建议将巴塞尔交易账簿规则推迟至 2028 年
item.description: 英国央行提议，作为提高英国贷款机构竞争力的一系列措施的一部分，允许投资银行在 2028 年初之前对其交易业务实施全球资本规则。【原文：The Bank of England has proposed giving investment banks until the start of 2028 to implement global capital rules on their trading businesses as part of a range of measures to boost British lenders’ competitiveness.】

item.title: 肯尼亚吹捧本国经济环境，希望外国投资翻番
item.description: 肯尼亚投资局计划在 2026 年召开一次会议，以强调东非国家良好的宏观经济环境，帮助促进外国直接投资。【原文：The Kenyan Investment Authority plans a conference in 2026 to highlight the East African nation’s favorable macroeconomic climate and help boost foreign direct investment.】

item.title: 中国投资者在当地低利率环境下的外汇储备达到 1 万亿美元
item.description: 中国企业和家庭上个月增加了外币存款，达到三年来的最高水平，因为他们押注国内利率将继续保持在低水平，从而回避人民币。【原文：Chinese corporates and households boosted their foreign-currency deposits last month to the highest in three years, as they shunned the yuan on bets domestic interest rates will remain low.】

item.title: S&P 五个月内第二次下调塞内加尔信用评级
item.description: S&P全球评级公司在五个月内第二次将塞内加尔的信用评级进一步下调至垃圾级，理由是这个西非国家的债务负担不断加重。【原文：S&P Global Ratings cut Senegal’s credit rating further into junk for a second time in five months, citing the West African nation’s rising debt burden.】

item.title: 特朗普对俄罗斯的威胁使石油买家印度和中国成为关注焦点
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统威胁要对俄罗斯实施经济制裁，这让莫斯科原油的两个最大买家--印度和中国--成了焦点，但市场目前仍对这种破坏持怀疑态度。【原文：President Donald Trump’s threat to impose financial penalties on Russia has put the spotlight on the two biggest buyers of Moscow’s crude — India and China — but markets remain skeptical of disruption, for now.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将上涨，英镑因关税担忧缓解而上涨
中国数据显示钢铁和房地产行业陷入困境，铁矿石下跌
item.description: 数据显示，随着中国房地产业在长期低迷中挣扎，中国粗钢产量急剧下降，铁矿石随之下跌。【原文：Iron ore dropped after data showed China’s crude steel output has plummeted as the nation’s property sector struggles under a prolonged downturn.】

item.title: Pandox 财团出价 14 亿欧元收购达拉塔酒店
item.description: 包括 Pandox AB 和 Eiendomsspar AS 在内的一个财团已向 Dalata Hotel Group Plc 提出了 14 亿欧元（16 亿美元）的明确收购要约，Dalata 董事会打算一致推荐该收购要约。【原文：A consortium including Pandox AB and Eiendomsspar AS has made a firm €1.4 billion ($1.6 billion) offer for Dalata Hotel Group Plc, which the board of Dalata intends to recommend unanimously.】

item.title: 比特币回调，创纪录涨势引发获利回吐
item.description: 比特币破纪录的涨势使这一顶级数字代币突破了 120,000 美元的里程碑，交易者纷纷套现，导致比特币下跌。【原文：Bitcoin fell as traders cashed in after a record-breaking rally sent the top digital token above the $120,000 milestone.】

item.title: 比特币在旧制度瓦解时蓬勃发展
item.description:
加密货币周推动了寄希望于监管革命的反弹。【原文：

Crypto Week drives a rally pinned on hopes for a revolution in regulation. 

】

item.title: 新加坡私人住宅销售跌至六个月新低
item.description: 就在政府出台新措施抑制房价之前，新加坡 6 月份的新建私人住宅销售量降至 6 个月来的最低水平。【原文：Singapore’s new private home sales declined to the lowest level in six months in June, just before authorities introduced new measures to tame prices.】
